name: RobotsVsZombies Demo
description:
Robots Vs Zombies

Robots Vs Zombies is an arcade 2d-shooter, where you play Seargent Ryan, a fearless soldier, who fights against zombies in his mech suit. RvZ is in Early-Access now, but you can download the free demo of it.

What's coming next?

              • Power-Ups
              • More guns
              • More zombies
              • Bosszombie
